Description:
MODERN, STYLISH & COMPLETE
Awesome Investment - it doesn't get any easier than this! Why go through the hassles of building when all of the hard work has been done. Located in a quiet street this near new three bedroom home is ideal for the astute investor, first home buyer or young family! Its functional split level design comprises a spacious informal living room & dining area both overlooked by a modern kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances. An additional dining area or second living area is positioned at the front of the home. A private rear yard is low maintenance, safe and secure. The generous master bedroom features a walk-in robe and ensuite, step up past the living area towards two more bedrooms, each with built in robes and a main bathroom with separate toilet. Extras include reverse cycle heating & cooling, remote double garage & secure tenancy in place until August 2014. This home's been immaculately maintained over the years, and is presented to perfection! The location speaks for itself, tenant is to be applauded, inspection will impress!
Cameron Tweed : 0400 869 698

Description:
Quality Fit-Out With Unique Features & Benefits
Impressive from the moment you walk through the front door, this ex display home is packed with all the extra features a home can offer.
Comprising 3 large bedrooms, all with built in robes and mirrors on the panels, and an inviting 3 piece bathroom with colonial windows.
From the spacious lounge, walk through an alcove into the large dining area featuring black ceramic tiles.
The kitchen is nestled at the rear of this area, with outside views overlooking the garden, and includes electric oven and gas hotplates, plenty of over head cupboards, huge walk in pantry and dishwasher.
The house also features 9ft ceilings, fancy cornices, elaborate light fittings and has evaporative air conditioning and ducted heating. The glass back door lets in plenty of morning sunlight, opening onto a paved sitting area and easily maintained garden.
Double lock up garage with remote control door, plus a small work shop with access through to the house completes the package.
In a prized location of Bendigo, move in and enjoy what this home has to offer.
Matt Gretgrix : 0438911688

Description:
PRIME LOCATION - YOU'LL LOVE IT...
Impeccably presented, this impressive 2 storey contemporary 3 brm home offers generously proportioned open plan interior spaces. The spacious living/dining/kitchen opens to an elevated timber deck overlooking Strathdale's surrounding tree-line. A beautiful kitchen: electric h/p & w/o, dishwasher & WI pantry area. An entertainer's delight! Modern roomy bathroom upstairs with shower plus another shower and toilet in laundry downstairs. Second open plan living/bedroom space downstairs leads
to a private English hedged garden room. The lower level would be a perfect for a teenager or a studio, being a self-contained area. Ideal to lease out, for an additional income. Extras include 2 x R/C s/systems, lovely polished timber floorboards, WI linen plus under staircase storage. Roller door to sgl carport.
Stone's throw to University, wonderful schools, Strath Village shopping precinct, Kennington Reservoir, walking tracks at rear into state forest and transport.
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Description:
A Modern Take On A Classic
A 1960's Brick Veneer renovated throughout in an unbeatable Kennington location only a few minutes out of the Bendigo CBD.
The home comprises three good size bedrooms, two with built in robes and a fully renovated spacious bathroom with shower and vanity. A stylishly designed kitchen which includes electric oven and gas hot plates, dishwasher and great cupboard space. The kitchen overlooks a dining area and the lounge room. There is ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling.
Outside you have a fully landscaped and established backyard with retaining walls, paving, outdoor entertaining, an abundance of plants and trees and a utility shed with concrete floor and power. An added bonus is the fantastic rumpus/games room with a wall of built in cupboards for storage- ideal for entertaining or for the kids.
Here there is nothing left to do from the front to back, a quality renovation that would suit a large range of buyers.

Description:
Wonderful Private Residence in Top Location.
Be totally captivated by this three bedroom plus study, brick veneer home built in 1990. The appealing facade, internal charm, fantastic deep 975sqm allotment collectively provides all the ingredients of this lovely family home. Comprises tiled entry opening into a very spacious formal lounge. Step down to the stunning fully glassed sunroom/dining area and well designed kitchen with gas hot plates & wall oven, dishwasher, pantry and excellent storage. Additional second living area. Relax in the outdoor entertaining area overlooking the private treed rear garden.
Side access into yard, brick 6m x 6m workshop & 14,000 litre. tank. Boasts:
9' ceilings, two gas heaters and evaporative cooling. Double carport. A versatile home that provides cool respite in summer and a warm cosy ambience in winter. Close to the action, this superbly presented home delivers an enticing inner urban lifestyle. Minutes into Bendigo's CBD & close to all of Kennington's conveniences including Kennington Reservoir & Latrobe University.
Di Long : 0417 343 380

Description:
SUB-DIVIDE WITH STREET FRONTAGE IN KENNINGTON
With stock markets in free-fall and interest rates at record lows, there has never been a better time to invest in property! This rare gem offers the astute purchaser an ideal scenario...live in or rent out the updated 3 bedroom home with the future option to sub-divide and construct a townhouse with street frontage to Leigh Avenue. The home has been recently updated and includes a new kitchen and spacious living. All three bedrooms include BIR's and the single garage underneath has been converted to a bungalow which doubles up as a 4th bedroom. With expired plans previously approved for a double story townhouse showing the options available with this unique property, be sure not to miss out on this great investment opportunity. Bendigo is now receiving national investment interest and our population growth is stronger than ever, don't let this one slip past.
Jesse Gardner : 0477 277 560

Description:
THE COMPLETE FAMILY HOME
The true family home still does really exist. Situated on a good sized allotment in a quiet street this large home has 4 bedrooms, dining room, large separate lounge & extra-large family room. Three bedrooms have built in robes with the main bedroom having the added benefit of an ensuite. Adjoining the meals area is the light-filled kitchen which has dishwasher, electric hotplates and electric wall oven. Children will love playing in the secure yard which also has a tool shed and BBQ area for entertaining guests. Car accommodation is provided by double carport.
Quote Range: $320,000 - $330,000

Description:
Absolute Luxury
Situated in the magnificent The Crest off Lakewood Drive this stunning two storey marvel is the definition of Absolute Luxury.
The Modern faade is a splendour on the eye, along with first class landscaping and a pristine view you would be proud to come home too.
As you open this treat through the Grand Timber door you are welcomed by large hi gloss tiles, raised ceilings and expansive space.
On the ground floor you will find the fourth bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, an executive style study which can double as a fifth bedroom, a good sized tiled laundry with plenty of storage and powder room for you or your guests.
The beautifully modern kitchen and dining area is complete with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, ceaserstone bench tops and even a built in wine rack.
Through the bi-fold doors off the second of 3 huge living spaces, the home opens up to the backyard and sunken outdoor entertaining area.
Up the Redwood timber staircase the top storey features the double size main bedroom with walk in his and her robes plus an elegant ensuite. Also upstairs is a lounge room to accommodate the second and third bedrooms which also including walk in robes.
The main bathroom has stunning views over Bendigo and of the Cathedral which also features a bathtub, large shower and floor to ceiling tiles.
The Upstairs Living area opens up to the outside balcony for those hot summer nights.
This magnificent home is only 100m from Kennington Reservoir and short walk to Strathvillage shopping centre and minutes to Bendigo CBD.
In a nutshell, this property consists of 4 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, 3 Living Areas, Beautiful Kitchen and dining area, a spacious executive study or fifth bedroom, Double Lockup Garage, Balcony and Outdoor Entertaining Area.
You will be the envy of your friends living at this address!
Insights: 26 other 4 bedroom house in KENNINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
CHARACTER HOME IN PRIZED LOCATION
They say you should first and foremost, buy in the best location. Here we offer a contemporary & expertly renovated product with fine finish in an exceptional position.
This three bedroom residence cleverly combines a warm feel, with open plan meals / living & kitchen area. The gleaming kitchen is well appointed with stainless steel appliances, high ceilings & from here you overlook the private rear yard with an abundance of entertaining options under the covered patio area, or indulge amongst the tranquil manicured garden setting. Additional features include low maintenance yard, garden utility shed with concrete & power. A sensational separate Rumpus room / Gymnasium is well equipped, separate from the house & provides a secondary domain away from the main house.
Come inspect & complete the picture - this home has to be on your must see list!

Description:
Development Potential 1.3km from CBD
Situated within a short walk to the Bendigo CBD on a large 1012m2 allotment is this impressive property offering an excellent opportunity for further development (subject to council approval). The solid original brick veneer residence offers a spacious floor plan and includes three bedrooms and separate living and dining areas. This is an excellent opportunity for investors/developers to complete some minor refurbishment to the dwelling to maximise rental return whilst exploring the development aspect. The convenience to the CBD, recreational facilities, university and schools will also appeal to owner occupiers looking to secure a central property with abundant yard space for kids and pets to enjoy.
The arrangement of the property could be perfect for medical/consulting rooms (STCA) with space at the rear providing room for ample car parking.

Description:
Rare to Find - Designed to Impress!!!
A prime opportunity to secure this four bedroom plus study residence in one of Kennington's sought after areas. Head down the service road where resting on a 3,300m2 (approx.) block of beautifully landscaped gardens, abutting an in ground pool & lawn tennis area, collectively add up to so many wonderful ingredients for your growing family's entertainment.
Featuring three large separate internal living areas, polished hardwood timber floors, multi-level ceilings, central glass atrium with fountain, ducted gas heating and
2 reverse cycle split systems. Off the rear of the home, step onto the huge undercover alfresco area which offers calming views of the property. Indoors can easily cater for the larger family and hosting parties. Extras include circular drive, separate single garage plus a lined and insulated workshop/bungalow and double carport. A variety of fruit trees and 2 rainwater tanks. For those looking for class, lifestyle and space with the convenience of being close to the heart of Bendigo, this property offers the lot!

Description:
MC IVOR HILL PRECINCT
How pleasant, a court off a court! This family friendly zone is in a prized position, bordering Strathdale, positioned in the heart of Kennington and also perched on the well renowned “Mc Ivor Hill” - this is the desirable location you just have to be a part of. The elevated allotment welcomes you with the verandah & well established low maintenance garden, the overall presentation will impress! The solid brick home has been designed & built with quality and integrity, this you can see is evident throughout the home, providing a great feel & warmth! Three large bedrooms, master with ensuite, the second & third have built in robes. Great three piece family bathroom, modern & well appointed Blackwood kitchen. Additional features include high ceilings, exposed brick, open plan kitchen & meals area, ducted gas heating & evaporative cooling. The outside patio area is well designed, with gas BBQ connected & ready for entertaining. Also featuring double carport, with workshop & storage. This is a rare offering, don't regret missing this - Inspect today!

Easy living that will suit Investors, professional couples, weekenders and even downsizer's looking for an easy to maintain property. Description:
Cream Brick Brilliance
This classic cream brick home has been freshly painted throughout and has new carpet in the lounge & bedrooms, plus new vinyl flooring in the kitchen/meals area. All 3 bedrooms have BIRs, while the bathroom has a 2 way toilet thru to the laundry. A gas wall heater & mounted air conditioner in the lounge room provides year round comfort. A well maintained home on a large allotment with room to extend, install a large shed, a pool or even consider sub-dividing (STCA). There's a single carport with secure gates, a storage shed plus a smaller garden shed. This property would be an ideal investment as it is located close to schools, La Trobe Uni and local shops.

Description:
SOUGHT AFTER CREAM BRICKER IN KENNINGTON
This elevated solid cream brick home in a well sought after area has lots to offer. In original condition it is structurally sound and has a great floor plan. The lounge dining area is huge with large windows and offering a connecting balcony out to the front of the home. This era home rarely offers 2 bathrooms as the main bedroom contains the bonus of a connecting ensuite. There are 3 bedrooms in total and generous side access to the rear yard and handy to nearby bus stop. Needing some cosmetic renovation this home is well worth inspecting.
Judy-Ann Cantwell

Description:
THE PERFECT EASY CARE LIVING
This easy care living option is located in a premier position of a quiet court, surrounded by all modern homes to protect your investment. Close to Strath Village, schools, doctors, La Trobe University, Kennington Reservoir and the Bendigo Club.Positioned on a compact block, this brick veneer Townhouse/Unit offers the perfect retirement lifestyle , a great investment or the opportunity to downsize, with it,s low maintenance block. 2 ample sized bedrooms, both with BIR,s, large formal lounge, with split system air-conditioner, separate living or dining area, modern kitchen with gas and electric cooking, double bowl sink, 3 piece bathroom (bath, SSR vanity unit) separate toilet, single lock-up garage with remote control and direct access to the home, plus a garden shed. This gem is larger than a normal unit, handy to public transport but still in a quiet environment of the ever popular Kennington/ Strathdale area. Make your move now, as vacant possession is available.
Property Code: 1641

Description:
KENNINGTON SHINES
This stand alone Solid Brick unit has so many delightful features; inside and out
From the front entry into the lounge you are able to appreciate the spaciousness of the rooms, dining and kitchen with open plan from the lounge.
Lovely east facing window in the lounge that lets in the early morning sun, just before you take a stroll around the Kennington Lake.
Two large bedrooms with Built in robes, good bathroom with the advantage of having a separate bath, shower and vanity.
Very private rear garden with access to shed and single carport which is entranced off Strathdale Crescent
We are so lucky to have this unit for sale as the presentation by the current tenant is First Class;she has been here for a very long time and loves the unit as if it were her own.
For investment purposes this unit stands out, for quality, spaciousness and very convenient position for future gain and long term tenancy.
Walk around the lovely surrounds of the Kennington Reserve, enjoy the local sporting facilities, the shopping, the school.....and then there's a bus stop across the road.
Helen Ashby : 0408 42 5566
